activities: On behalf of EU durable medical equipment providers and sleep labs (“Providers”), for treatment purposes and for monitoring patient compliance, Philips Respironics hosts an EncoreAnywhere web site and database that stores and processes Personal Data that it receives including the Personal Data of 1) patients, 2) physicians and their authorized employees, and 3) the authorized employees of durable medical equipment providers and sleep labs.  Certain Patient Data also will be transferred from a Philips Respironics medical device to Philips Respironics’ servers via modem.
contactoff1: Privacy Officer, Philips Home Healthcare Solutions
corpofftitle1: Senior Director, New Business Solutions, Home Healthcare Solutions
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personally identifiable information (PII) received in US about authorized employees of durable medical equipment providers, sleep labs and individual physicians and their authorized employees in the EU who utilize the EncoreAnywhere services and related website. PII received in the US about patients located in the EU. Philips Respironics acts only as data processor with regard to such patient data
recoursemech: commitment to cooperate with data protection suthorities (DPAs) located in the European Union or their authorized representatives.
